revision.text:
{{codepointer|Weapon|r=Hexen}} '''A_CHolyAttack'''
(''no parameter'')
Fires a {{Class|HolyMissile}} and set their tracer target. The sound "HolySymbolFire" is played on the WEAPON channel. In addition the counter {{c|CHolyCount}} is set to 3 which initiates a [[palette blend]] that will be changed by [[A_CHolyPalette]]. This codepointer is restricted to {{Class|CWeapWraithverge}} and derived classes.
